author: Chuck DeVore
title: With States Running Out of Money, a Fiscal Crisis Will Likely Follow the Pandemic | Opinion
description: The wider economic fallout from the virus and governments' response to it has been unprecedented.
content: In what seems like a lifetime ago, state government finances across the nation were moving in divergent directions, with 28 states having replenished their fund balances above what they held before the onset of the recession in 2007. Meanwhile, states such as… [+4925 chars]
